text: Regina Bayer is a Republican Idaho State Senator since 2019, representing District 21. Bayer was appointed by Governor Brad Little to fill the seat vacated by her son, Senator Cliff Bayer, who left to become the Chief of Staff to U.S. Representative Russ Fulcher. == Committee assignments == Bayer served on the Health & Welfare and Agricultural Affairs committees during the 2019–2020 legislative session. == References == Category:Idaho Republicans Category:Idaho state senators Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Regina Bayer
